The CARES Act addresses two priorities: the safety and health of citizens and economic viability. Funds will directly benefit American families and the businesses where they work.

There is no quick fix to eliminating the virus, but this bill goes a long way in fighting COVID-19.

UPDATE: Since I have to be in DC today for the House vote on the CARES Act, we've postponed our telephone town hall to next Wednesday, 4/1 at 6:30pm.
